{"id":1374310620,"question_id":3531,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1725116826,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"203 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1374310620/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Amount of Damage Dealt to Bob","memory":"144.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long minDamage(int power, vector<int>& damage, vector<int>& health) {\n        int N = (int)damage.size();\n\n        long long sum = 0;\n        vector<pair<double, pair<int, int>>> arr(N);\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            health[i] = ceil(health[i]*1.0/power);\n            sum += damage[i];\n            arr[i] = {damage[i]*1.0/health[i], {damage[i], health[i]}};\n        }\n        sort(arr.rbegin(), arr.rend());\n\n        long long ans = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            ans += sum * arr[i].second.second;\n            sum -= arr[i].second.first;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-amount-of-damage-dealt-to-bob","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
